title: One Final Tournament
description:
Tony Kornheiser and Michael Wilbon discuss Roger Federer’s decision to retire after the Laver Cup and reflect on his career, if they are more bullish on the Chargers or the Chiefs tonight and Steve Young joins the show for 5 Good Minutes. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Tony Kornheiser, Michael Wilbon
itunes:subtitle: PTI: Roger Federer announces his plan to retire and Steve Young joins the show for 5 Good Minutes.
